phrases: Bell does not belong to anybody.
I just said it to say it!
No, I wanted to say it!
Please, do not leave me alone!
Now, now, you are being loud.
Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
This may not be the time,
but when is your next day off work?
I have started to make a lot of money in the dungeon lately,
and I wanted to repay you for everything you have done for me.
Would you like to go get a nice dinner or something?
Bell-kun, I will see you at six of clock this evening on Southwest Main, at Amour Square!
They are as big as ever, I see.
Yours are pretty big, too, are not they?
Is not this the first time you have visited the Divine Bathhouse?
Actually, I am meeting someone after this.
I want to go all-out for it.
Hestia, who was always so totally hopeless in heaven?
He is a child from my familia.
What do you like about him?
Is that Hestia's new man I heard about?
We were curious so we followed along.
This is the problem with deities!
They are a pack of fun-starved hyenas!
Thanks to them, it is already so late.
But it was kind of fun.
Goddess, let us come back here sometime.
Next time, I will actually buy you dinner.
I will be looking forward to it, Bell-kun.
But that is still not nearly enough, is it, Arde?
Who is responsible for the fact that a
useless supporter like you can be part of the Soma Familia with us?
It is thanks to you adventurers.
If you know that, then go work until you drop dead!
Did you see how she fell?
We need you to keep making that money for us.
I only owe a little more.
I will get my hands on that knife...
It is all thanks to you, Lili.
Another Soma Familia adventurer got in a fight with the money exchange.
Why are they always so desperate?
They sell plenty of drinks, so I cannot imagine they are hard up for money...
Hey, Lili, you just used magic, did not you?
No, that was a magic weapon.
You used something that valuable for my sake?
I am glad to do it for you.
I got this as a present, but...
Sure, but... do you have plans or something?
My familia is having a meeting, and I have to be there, no matter what.
I know this violates my contract,
and I will accept the penalty.
Oh, do not worry about that!
I did not think of that.
When you want a day off, just tell me.
You are not going to the dungeon today?
Yeah, I have suddenly got some free time.
What do you do on your days off, Syr-san?
But all the books my Goddess has look really hard.
Modern Magic That Even a Goblin Could Understand...
One of the customers left it here.
And it does not seem like they will come back for it.
I will lend it to you, if you want.
It is not like I will be missing it.
Just give it back when you are finished reading.
There are two types of magic.
The first is what certain races are born with.
The second, called Farna, is granted by a deity's blessing.
The latter is, in a sense, a form of self-expression.
What do you truly long for?
The trigger is always within you.
A weapon to defeat my inner weakness, and make me stronger.
What sort of thing is magic to me?
One that burns strong and hot.
A red flame that does not suit a weak person like me at all.
What do I seek from magic?
The woman who is faster than anyone, like a lightning bolt...
I want to catch up to her.
I would like to be a hero.
Like in the fairy tales I read when I was a kid.
A hero they would be satisfied with.
But that is who I am!
So you actually read a book for once,
and it put you to sleep, huh?
I never thought you would develop magic!
This is because of that skill, too.
You know you need to chant a spell to use magic, right?
Normally, when you first become able to use magic,
the spell is displayed along with your status.
there is nothing there except the note Swift-Strike Magic.
My guess is that maybe your magic does not need a chant.
Anyway, when you go to the dungeon tomorrow,
give it a try on something.
There is no need to rush.
Your magic is not going anywhere!
I want to use it right now.
I did not mean to go this far.
When we get back everybody's going to be
surprised that you defeated a floor boss all by yourself.
He used too much magic without thinking about it.
I have never spoken to him myself.
Um, but when that thing happened with the minotaur...
He was the kid who got caught up in our mistake, huh?
Riveria, I want to make it up to him.
That is more than enough to atone.
I will be going back ahead of you.
Why does he always run away?
Did you have a bad dream?
Think it is because of this book you read yesterday?
A book that let us you use magic as appropriate
to your latent ability when read.
It is truly a magic book.
Where the heck did you get this?
I borrowed it at the tavern.
They said somebody forgot it, so I could read it.
A grimoire loses its power once somebody reads it!
I need to apologize and pay them back
Do you know how much a grimoire costs?
As much as a top-grade piece of equipment from the Hephaestus Familia!
You have not read the book.
I will take care of the rest.
Sometimes you have to do these things in the lower world!
The world is more whimsical than a god!
Do not come up with great quotes at a time like this!
What a big problem you have caused, Bell-san.
Syr-san, why are you acting like you are not involved?
Is it not going to work?
You are very cute, but it is not.
You read it, so there is nothing we can do now.
It is the fault of whoever left it here.
I-I am off to the dungeon!
I am here to replenish our item stocks.
I am not here to buy you drinks.
Making you buy such an expensive drink for my sake...
I was going to have to buy some anyway.
I will feel better if it is at least helping you.
Um, you were asking about the Soma Familia, right?
Well, basically, the children there do not worship Soma.
You are that guy from before...
Do not try to fool me.
Do not look at me like that.
You are after the money she is saved, too, right?
Let us work together and get some cash from that useless pack mule.
Lili, when did you get here?
What were you talking with that adventurer about?
It was like a fight almost broke out.
Maybe it is time to say goodbye...
